query:
-- Create livestock_health_records table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS livestock_health_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  recordDate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  recordType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  veterinarian VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_health (animalId)
);

-- Create vaccination_schedules table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccination_schedules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  vaccinationType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  vaccineName VARCHAR(255),
  dueDate DATE NOT NULL,
  completedDate DATE,
  veterinarian VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_vaccination (animalId)
);

-- Create health_metrics table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS health_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  recordDate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  weight DECIMAL(10, 2),
  temperature DECIMAL(5, 2),
  heartRate INT,
  respiratoryRate INT,
  bodyConditionScore DECIMAL(3, 1),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedBy VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_metrics (animalId)
);

-- Create disease_incidents table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disease_incidents (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  incidentDate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  diseaseType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  symptoms TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(50),
  treatment TEXT,
  veterinarian VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  recoveryDate DATE,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_disease (animalId)
);

-- Create prescription_compliance table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prescription_compliance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  prescriptionId INT NOT NULL,
  complianceDate DATE NOT NULL,
  dosesGiven INT,
  dosesScheduled INT,
  compliancePercentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
  photoUrl VARCHAR(500),
  videoUrl VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedBy VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_prescription_compliance (prescriptionId)
);

-- Create compliance_evidence table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS compliance_evidence (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  complianceId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceType VARCHAR(50),
  fileUrl VARCHAR(500),
  fileType VARCHAR(50),
  uploadedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_compliance_evidence (complianceId)
);

-- Create vaccination_schedules table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccination_schedules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  vaccinationType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  dueDate DATE NOT NULL,

  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',

  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

-- Create health_metrics table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS health_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  recordDate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  weight DECIMAL(10, 2),
  temperature DECIMAL(5, 2),
  heartRate INT,
  respiratoryRate INT,
  bodyConditionScore DECIMAL(3, 1),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedBy VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_metrics (animalId)
);

-- Create disease_incidents table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disease_incidents (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  animalId INT NOT NULL,
  incidentDate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  diseaseType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  symptoms TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(50),
  treatment TEXT,
  veterinarian VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  recoveryDate DATE,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_animal_disease (animalId)
);

-- Create prescription_compliance table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prescription_compliance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  prescriptionId INT NOT NULL,
  complianceDate DATE NOT NULL,
  dosesGiven INT,
  dosesScheduled INT,
  compliancePercentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
  photoUrl VARCHAR(500),
  videoUrl VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedBy VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_prescription_compliance (prescriptionId)
);

-- Create compliance_evidence table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS compliance_evidence (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  complianceId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceType VARCHAR(50),
  fileUrl VARCHAR(500),
  fileType VARCHAR(50),
  uploadedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY idx_compliance_evidence (complianceId)
